Croatian Health Insurance Portal

2019 — 2020

Croatian Health Insurance Portal

Accessible government portal redesign covering the needs & questions for the entire Croatian population.

  • 350 page hierarchy (excluding news articles)

  • 230,000 historic search queries analyzed

  • 1,876 public survey responses

  • 30 internal interviews

  • LinkedIn
  • GitHub

I’ve designed this website in Penpot, hand-coded it with TypeScript in VS Code using Bun, Astro and Tailwind CSS. Content is managed by and pulled from a self-hosted Strapi CMS. The code for this website is publicly available on GitHub, while Cloudflare Pages continuously deploys it as a static website.
